query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Final Report on Innovation and Exploitation Actions
result.description: This deliverable is going to be the final project deliverable in regards to reporting the innovation and exploitation results, overall progress achieved and performance against plan, as well as on the awareness on the innovation and exploitation results that have been achieved overall by the project. Moreover, it will describe the impact that these actions have delivered, as well as further innovation that the project is driving after its completion. The report will include the measurable exploitation results that have been achieved and their drive towards further growth.

result.title: Presentation of INTEGROIL results in relevant events and conferences
result.description: Deliverable 5.8 will document the INTEGROIL consortium’s participation at external events, as agreed upon task 5.1. This participation has a 2-fold objective: promoting more research activities related to water treatment in water-intensive industries, and prepare market take-up of the results, establishing contacts to industrial users.

result.title: Project Handbook
result.description: The aim of this Project Handbook is to give a quick and short overview of the most relevant project information, procedures and conditions for the partners in the INTEGROIL Project. Furthermore, the purpose is to elaborate on issues given in the Consortium Agreement that may need further explanation to become operative, and give the partners a reference document about their responsibilities. Some aspects that may be explained here are: • Reporting (technical and financial) (T.7.5) • Meeting arrangement (T.7.4) • Management structure and communication chain (T.7.1, T.7.2 and T.7.3) • Budget issues

result.title: Communication plan
result.description: A Communication plan will be created wihin Task 5.1., to set the rules for showing INTEGROIL outcomes to general public, raising the awareness about the problem faced in the project and the benefits of the new technology. Additionally to other general guidelines (key message, communication methods, target audience), the next issues will be faced: • Visual identity • Communication materials (report templates, presentations, etc) • Website style • Social media used for communication • Press relations • How to monitor the impact of communication activities

result.title: Project website
result.description: The project website will be created specifically for dissemination purposes as well as for project information exchange between partners (T.5.1). It will be designed following the recommendations of the reference document “Project EU Project Websites – Best Practice Guidelines”. Thus, it will have equilibrium between a too condensed structure (too much information under few headings) and a structure with little accessibility (too many menus). The Homepage will be visually attractive and informative, giving access to other sections (Project overview, Consortium, Work packages, Media centre, etc). These sections would be further expanded into sub-sections if necessary. The EU co-funding will be duly acknowledged, also by the inclusion of the relevant logos.

result.title: Operative framework for LCA studies
result.description:
This deliverable will gather the results and conclusions of Task 6.1, regarding the water treatment, the main water quality parameters technologies, and the data requirements to be assessed along LCA and LCC.
Moreover, the functional unit will be described, and the selection of the final assessment (which will be also described) will be explained.

result.title: Reviewed Data Managing Plan
result.description: This document, developed under Task 7.1, will be an updated version of the Data Managing Plan. It will include the guidelines for the dissemination of the results obtained to all project partners in order to fulfil the requirements of Open data Research Pilot but without compromising IPR of INTEGROIL platform. It will update which data can be made available by project partners according to ODRP, and when the data will be made available. Finally, this document will update the methods and periods for preserving obtained data.

result.title: Technical workshop
result.description: As exposed in task 5.1, a technical workshop will be organized to present the advances and technological achievements of the project. Key stakeholders of the O&G industry (extraction, refining, field services, business associations), the environment sector (water companies) and the scientific community will be invited. Obtained results, advantages and potential application scenarios will also exposed along this Workshop.

result.title: Presentation of INTEGROIL results in relevant publications and journalistic articles

result.title: Data Managing Plan
result.description:
This document (developed under Task 7.1) will provide guidelines for data management to all project partners, in order to grant dissemination of data (fulfilling the requirements of Open Data Research Pilot but without compromising IPR of INTEGROIL platform). It will define the data that will be generated along the project, and will set whether and how will be used by project partners. Moreover, it will define which data can be made available according to ODRP, and when the data will be made available. Finally, this document will specify the methods and periods for preserving obtained data.
The use of a Data Management Plan is required for projects participating in the Open Research Data Pilot.
